user.title: Add Philips Shaver Manually
user.description: Enter the Bluetooth MAC address of the shaver.

bluetooth_confirm.title: Confirm Discovered Device
bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to add the discovered Philips Shaver "{name}" to Home Assistant?

bluetooth_unpaired.title: Device Not Paired (Pairing Required)
bluetooth_unpaired.description:
The device "{name}" was discovered, but it appears it has **not been paired** on the host operating system (Host OS).

**Important:** This integration requires OS-level Bluetooth pairing *before* configuring it in Home Assistant (see **README, Step 1**).

Click **Submit** to continue configuring *after* you have completed the pairing, or **Abort** to do it later.

abort.no_devices_found: No supported Philips Shaver devices were found within range.
